Rewriting the African Narrative through Technology

Codespace is a Platform that aims to build a community for teenagers. The platform aims to show the world how ready and capable we teenagers are to rewrite the African narrative through Technology.

Team Projects

CODESPACE is a Platform that aims to build a community for teenagers. The platform aims to show the world how ready and capable We teenagers are to rewrite the African narrative through technology.

Afro Watch

Afro Watch is platform where you can stream over 100 + Live tv channels on the go. Without any interruption. and data consumption are well calculated.

Built by: Clinton Imaro

Covdash
